questions.questionText: Which country won the 2018 FIFA World Cup?
questions.explanation: France won the 2018 FIFA World Cup, defeating Croatia 4-2 in the final.

questions.questionText: Who is the current world No. 1 tennis player in men's singles?
questions.explanation: Novak Djokovic is the current world No. 1 tennis player in men's singles, having held the top spot since February 2020.

questions.questionText: In what year did Michael Jordan win his first NBA championship with the Chicago Bulls?
questions.explanation: Michael Jordan won his first NBA championship with the Chicago Bulls in 1991, beginning a run of six championships in eight years for the team.

questions.questionText: Which country has won the most Olympic gold medals in men's ice hockey?
questions.explanation: Canada has won the most Olympic gold medals in men's ice hockey, with a total of 9 golds.

questions.questionText: Who won the men's singles title at the 2021 Wimbledon Championships?
questions.explanation: Novak Djokovic won the men's singles title at the 2021 Wimbledon Championships, defeating Matteo Berrettini in the final.
